Package edu.usfca.cs

Class Playlist

java.lang.Object
edu.usfca.cs.Entity
edu.usfca.cs.Playlist
public class Playlist extends Entity
Playlist is the class to create Artist objects for the library Extends the Entity class contains array list of Songs, Artists and Albums as objects writeXML method: writes the playlist content to an XML file has a main method to test writeXML()

Since:
1.0
Author:
Gizem Hazal Senturk
